metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28851 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
In x/text in Go 1.15.4, an "index out of range" panic occurs inlanguage.ParseAcceptLanguage while parsing the -u- extension.(x/text/language is supposed to be able to parse an HTTP Accept-Languageheader.)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-golang-x-text-dev - 0.3.6-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-text package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-1').
